attributes.action: Put Enoch Powell on the £50 note.
attributes.additional_details: Never forget history, learn from those that past and we'll build a better future.
attributes.background:
There's been much debate over who should be on the new fifty pound note. 
I believe that now, more than ever, we need to remember our history and one of the most influential politicians. 
With the rise of immigration across Europe, it would be wise to put his face on the fifty pound note.

rejection.details:
Bank notes are the responsibility of the Bank of England, which is independent of the Government and Parliament. 

You can find out how the Bank decides who will be on bank notes here: 

https://www.bankofengland.co.uk/banknotes/banknote-characters
